DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy acupuncture massage treatment depression pregnancy . The study also examine differential effect study treatment delivery outcome post partum depression .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study randomly assign one three experimental group include two type acupuncture treatment perinatal massage . The two acupuncture treatment deliver double-blind fashion . Treatments consist acute phase participant receive 12 treatment session period 8 week . Responders partial responder enter continuation phase receive weekly treatment end 10 week post delivery . At end continuation phase , participant continue clinically assess 3 6 month end treatment detail natural course relapse index episode three treatment group .

Current use prescribe psychotropic medication medication impact mood . Treatment ECT vagal nerve stimulation last year . Current active suicidal potential necessitate immediate treatment .
